duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct formal review of all protocols, specifications, methods, and documents used within a LIMS system for sample auditing.
Manage technical information within a LIMS system for Sample Management.
Interact with clients via email and phone, and communicate with Project Management, Business Development, and Technical groups as necessary.
Regularly provide status updates to supervisor.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Science (Laboratory experience preferred)
